message.body: Hey Sofie. So lets set a time to meet. Any possibility for Wed am or Tuesday around 5:30 in Cambridge

Caesar, unfortunately not. This week is different as I show I co curated is opening on Wednesday. You are more than invited to join if interested. It's about twelve interactive pieces set up at massart (621 huntington ave 11th floor) on the 20th at 6 pm! It would be a pleasure to see you. So this week is a little hectic, but I'm free Friday!
Good luck on opening. Will try and stop by. Should we try for next Tue around 5:30?
I have class Tuesday night and Wednesday morning I could do Thursday evening
Um next Thur flying to Denver. Might you have time Wed afternoon
Wednesday afternoon is tight but yes! i can meet you in cambridge around two thirty!
